name: suksma - obligatory bioluminescent cords
milkdrop_raw:

[preset00]

b3x=1.000
b1ed=0.250

wavecode_0_sep=256

wavecode_0_g=1.000
wavecode_0_b=1.000
wavecode_0_a=0.600
wave_0_init1=time1=10000;
wave_0_init2=time2=10000;
wave_0_init3=f2=0;
wave_0_per_frame1=time1=time1+q3*bass*.001*q4*sign(bass_att-treb);
wave_0_per_frame2=time2=time2+q3*treb*.001*q4*sign(treb_att-bass);
wave_0_per_frame3=mtime=mtime+q6*.001+q4*.001;
wave_0_per_frame4=
wave_0_per_frame5=
wave_0_per_frame6=t1=time1;
wave_0_per_frame7=t2=time2;
wave_0_per_frame8=t3=mtime;
wave_0_per_point1=i=sample*6.28;
wave_0_per_point2=
wave_0_per_point3=x1=sin(i+t2+value1*1*q3)-sin(i*t1);
wave_0_per_point4=y1=cos(i+t1+value2*1*q3)+sin(i*t2);
wave_0_per_point5=
wave_0_per_point6=x=x1*.5+.5;
wave_0_per_point7=y=y1*.5+.5;
wave_0_per_point8=
wave_0_per_point9=mtime=mtime+.0001;
wave_0_per_point10=
wave_0_per_point11=// This is the version you should use...
wave_0_per_point12=// ----------- start copying -----------
wave_0_per_point13=hue=t3*sample; // change this
wave_0_per_point14=h=6*(hue-int(hue));
wave_0_per_point15=sw1=below(h,1); sw2=(1-sw1)*below(h,2); sw3=(1-sw1)*(1-sw2)*below(h,3); sw4=(1-sw1)*(1-sw2)*(1-sw3)*below(h,4);
wave_0_per_point16=sw6=above(h,5); sw5=(1-sw1)*(1-sw2)*(1-sw3)*(1-sw4)*(1-sw6);
wave_0_per_point17=r1=sw1+sw2*(2-h)+sw5*(h-4)+sw6;  // resulting Red value, assign it to q1
wave_0_per_point18=g1=sw1*h+sw2+sw3+sw4*(4-h);      // resulting Green value, assign it to q2
wave_0_per_point19=b1=sw3*(h-2)+sw4+sw5+sw6*(6-h);  // resulting Blue value, assign it to q3
wave_0_per_point20=// ----------- end ----------------
wave_0_per_point21=
wave_0_per_point22=
wave_0_per_point23=
wave_0_per_point24=
wave_0_per_point25=r=r1;
wave_0_per_point26=g=g1;
wave_0_per_point27=b=b1;

shapecode_0_tex_zoom=1.00000

shapecode_0_g=1.000

shapecode_0_g2=1.000

shapecode_0_border_g=1.000
shapecode_0_border_b=1.000
shapecode_0_border_a=0.100
shape_0_per_frame1=r=0;
shape_0_per_frame2=g=0;
shape_0_per_frame3=b=0;
shape_0_per_frame4=
shape_0_per_frame5=r2=r;
shape_0_per_frame6=g2=g;
shape_0_per_frame7=b2=b;
shape_0_per_frame8=border_a=0;
shape_0_per_frame9=
shape_0_per_frame10=a=.6*q2;
shape_0_per_frame11=a2=q7*.4;
shape_0_per_frame12=
shape_0_per_frame13=time1=time1+q3*q2*bass*.1;
shape_0_per_frame14=time2=time2+q3*q4*treb*.1;
shape_0_per_frame15=
shape_0_per_frame16=x1=sin(time1);
shape_0_per_frame17=y1=cos(time2);
shape_0_per_frame18=
shape_0_per_frame19=x=x1*.5+.5;
shape_0_per_frame20=y=y1*.5+.5;
shapecode_1_enabled=0
shapecode_1_sides=100
shapecode_1_additive=0
shapecode_1_thickOutline=0
shapecode_1_textured=0
shapecode_1_num_inst=1
shapecode_1_x=0.500
shapecode_1_y=0.500
shapecode_1_rad=0.43865
shapecode_1_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=1.000
shapecode_1_b=1.000
shapecode_1_a=0.500
shapecode_1_r2=1.000
shapecode_1_g2=1.000
shapecode_1_b2=1.000
shapecode_1_a2=0.000
shapecode_1_border_r=0.000
shapecode_1_border_g=0.000
shapecode_1_border_b=0.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shape_1_per_frame1=r=0;
shape_1_per_frame2=g=0;
shape_1_per_frame3=b=0;
shape_1_per_frame4=
shape_1_per_frame5=r2=r;
shape_1_per_frame6=g2=g;
shape_1_per_frame7=b2=b;
shape_1_per_frame8=
shape_1_per_frame9=a=.2*q7-q6*.01;
shape_1_per_frame10=a2=a*2;
shape_1_per_frame11=
shape_1_per_frame12=rad=.2;
shape_1_per_frame13=time1=time1+q3*q2*bass*.1;
shape_1_per_frame14=time2=time2+q3*q4*treb*.1;
shape_1_per_frame15=
shape_1_per_frame16=
shape_1_per_frame17=x1=sin(time1)+sin(time2*treb);
shape_1_per_frame18=y1=cos(time2)-sin(time2*mid);
shape_1_per_frame19=
shape_1_per_frame20=x=x1*.5+.5;
shape_1_per_frame21=y=y1*.5+.5;
shapecode_2_enabled=0
shapecode_2_sides=4
shapecode_2_additive=1
shapecode_2_thickOutline=1
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.43606
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=1.000
shapecode_2_b=1.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000
shapecode_2_r2=1.000
shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=1.000
shapecode_2_a2=1.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.100
shape_2_per_frame1=rad=q5*.33;
shape_2_per_frame2=y=.75;
shape_2_per_frame3=x=.2;
shapecode_3_enabled=0
shapecode_3_sides=4
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=1
shapecode_3_x=0.500
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.10000
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=0.000
shapecode_3_b=0.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=1.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=0.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.849*time) + 0.40*sin(1.090*time) ); 
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.711*time) + 0.40*sin(0.982*time) ); 
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.350*( 0.60*sin(0.737*time) + 0.40*sin(1.012*time) ); 
per_frame_4=cy = cy + 0.030*( 0.60*sin(0.393*time) + 0.40*sin(0.223*time) ); 
per_frame_5=sx = sx + 0.010*( 0.60*sin(0.313*time) + 0.40*sin(0.383*time) ); 
per_frame_6=sy = sy + 0.010*( 0.60*sin(0.367*time) + 0.40*sin(0.272*time) );
warp_1=`float3 color, mus;
warp_2=`float dx,dy;
warp_3=`
warp_4=`shader_body {
warp_5=`float corr = texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw;
warp_6=`
warp_7=`float2 uv1 = (uv-.5);
warp_8=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_9=`
warp_10=`float rota = lum(tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv/4))*q31;
warp_11=`
warp_12=`uv6 = mul(uv1,float2x2(cos(rota),-sin(rota),sin(rota),cos(rota)));
warp_13=`uv6 += sin(q32*uv1);
warp_14=`mus = .2/(sqrt(uv6.x)+.2);
warp_15=`
warp_16=`mus *= float3 (1.1,1,.95);
warp_17=`mus *= .9+.1*tex2D (sampler_noise_hq,uv);
warp_18=`
warp_19=`float3 blur = GetBlur1(frac(uv));
warp_20=`
warp_21=`float2 hor = float2 (0.005,0);
warp_22=`float2 ver = float2 (0,.005);
warp_23=`
warp_24=`float dx = lum(tex2D(sampler_main,uv+hor) 
warp_25=`         - tex2D(sampler_main,uv-hor));
warp_26=`float dy = lum(tex2D(sampler_main,uv+ver) 
warp_27=`         - tex2D(sampler_main,uv-ver));
warp_28=`
warp_29=`
warp_30=`float2 zz = float2 (dx,dy);
warp_31=`
warp_32=`float3 crisp= tex2D(sampler_main,uv+zz*.02);
warp_33=`float3 crisp2 = tex2D(sampler_main,uv);
warp_34=`crisp += crisp2/2;
warp_35=`crisp *= .67;
warp_36=`crisp +=.08 * mus - length(zz)*blur;
warp_37=`
warp_38=`float3 ret1 = crisp - lum(blur)*.04;
warp_39=`ret = ret1 * .99 -  .04 ;
warp_40=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 uv2;
comp_4=`
comp_5=`    float4 c = float4(1,0.4,0.15,0.1);
comp_6=`
comp_7=`    uv2 = uv + float2(1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_8=`    float gx1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_9=`    uv2 = uv + float2(-1,0)*texsize.zw;
comp_10=`    float gx2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,1)*texsize.zw;
comp_13=`    float gy1 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_14=`    uv2 = uv + float2(0,-1)*texsize.zw;
comp_15=`    float gy2 = GetPixel(uv2)*c.x + GetBlur1(uv2)*c.y + GetBlur2(uv2)*c.z + GetBlur3(uv2)*c.w;
comp_16=`
comp_17=`    float3 g = normalize(float3(gx1-gx2, gy1-gy2, 0.14));
comp_18=`
comp_19=`    ret = 0.5 + 0.5*g;
comp_20=`    ret *= saturate(length(ret.xy-0.5)*5);
comp_21=`    ret = ret.xxy;
comp_22=`    ret += 1.15;
comp_23=`    ret *= lerp(ret,ret*(GetBlur3(uv)-GetBlur1(uv)*treb_att),pow(hue_shader.xzy,bass_att));
comp_24=`    ret *= ret;
comp_25=`
comp_26=`    //ret *= 1.5; //old gamma effect    
comp_27=`}
